N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.7 - Issuance of advisory opinions

State Regulations
(a) Within 60 days of receipt of a complete
petition, the office shall issue an advisory opinion as to whether the agency
action in question should be taken pursuant to a rule. (b) An advisory opinion shall contain: (1)
the names of the petitioner and the
agency whose action is the subject of the petition; (2)
a statement identifying the advisory
opinion as such; (3)
a description
of the agency action in question; (4)
a statement of the office's conclusions; and
(5)
a discussion of the
reasoning upon which the conclusions are based including any precedential
material relied upon. (c) The office shall send a copy of the
advisory opinion to the petitioner and to the head of the agency whose action
is the subject of the advisory opinion. Notes
